advisory.name: RLBA-2021:1921
advisory.synopsis: docbook-style-xsl bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for docbook-style-xsl is now available for Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation EnterpriseLinux 8.
advisory.description:
For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation
Enterprise Linux 8.4 Release Notes linked from the References section.

fixes.description: Fails to generate consistent IDs when generate.consistent.ids parameter is set to 1
